about_the_game:
Get ready to dip your toes into the enchanting world of Swamped with our exclusive demo! This limited experience offers a glimpse into the charming and strategic tower defense adventure that awaits you.




In this demo, explore 4 unique maps teeming with whimsical environments and adorable foes. Strategically place 9 different towers, each with their own abilities to defend against waves of cute yet challenging enemies.




Hunt for 8 legendary hats that not only make your heroes look stylish but also boost their powers in battle. Collect magical items and craft your ultimate defense strategy as you delve into the enchanting world of Swamped.




As you progress through the maps, you'll encounter charming characters and unlock new challenges that hint at the broader adventure in the full game.

Demo Features:


  • Explore 4 unique and beautifully crafted maps.
  • Experiment with 9 different towers, each offering unique strategies.
  • Collect 8 legendary hats to boost your defense capabilities.
  • Get a taste of the adorable visuals and strategic gameplay Swamped has to offer.
  • Perfect for both tower defense veterans and newcomers looking for a charming challenge.

Dive into the world of Swamped with this demo and prepare yourself for the full adventure that lies ahead. The cutest and most strategic tower defense game is just a download away!

Join the fun and start your Swamped adventure today!

name: Swamped! Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: x86_32 CPU with SSE2 instructions, or any x86_64 CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5500
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K, AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

short_description: Experience a sneak peek of our enchanting Tower Defense! In this demo, explore 4 unique maps, collect 8 legendary hats, and experiment with 9 different defenses. Get a taste of the fun and strategy as you create the ultimate defense build! Explore a world filled with challenges to overcome!
